sourcesContent: import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { Form, Container } from "react-bootstrap" import { useState } from 'react' function TrainerMCQQuestion() { const [form, setForm] = useState({}) const setField = (field, value) => { setForm({ ...form, [field]: value }) } return ( Question Type: MCQ] setField("question", e.target.value)} /> setField("answer", e.target.value)} /> setField("option", e.target.value)} /> setField("answer", e.target.value)} /> setField("option", e.target.value)} /> setField("answer", e.target.value)} /> setField("option", e.target.value)} /> setField("answer", e.target.value)} /> setField("option", e.target.value)} /> ) } export default TrainerMCQQuestion
